starvationevasion.common

Enum EnumRegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<EnumRegion>
      • starvationevasion.common.EnumRegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<EnumRegion>

    public enum EnumRegion
extends java.lang.Enum<EnumRegion>
    Enumerates each of the geographic regions used in the game: both Player and non-Player regions.

    The ordinal of US regions are continuous and less than all non-Player world regions.

      • isUS

        public abstract boolean isUS()
        Returns:
        true if and only of the region is a player region of the United States of America.

      • getBit

        public int getBit()
        For US regions, returns an int with one bit set corresponding to the region's ordinal (0 through 6) for the 7 US regions. If not a US region, returns 0.
        Returns:
        bit
